name: Aadhar Kansal

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: • Developed social login authentication package which can be directly integrated with different authentication services.• Handled backend system of the platform to allow crypto exchanges & wrote cron jobs to automate payment system.• Migrated REST APIs to GraphQL based endpoints which improved the response time on complex queries by 19%.• Used Django Tenants to implement backend system for a SAAS model & added multiple role access system feature.• Exposure: Python, Django Rest Framework, Django Tenants, GraphQL, AWS Cognito, PostgreSQL
experience.description_html: • Developed social login authentication package which can be directly integrated with different authentication services.• Handled backend system of the platform to allow crypto exchanges & wrote cron jobs to automate payment system.• Migrated REST APIs to GraphQL based endpoints which improved the response time on complex queries by 19%.• Used Django Tenants to implement backend system for a SAAS model & added multiple role access system feature.• Exposure: Python, Django Rest Framework, Django Tenants, GraphQL, AWS Cognito, PostgreSQL

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: • Optimised video processing service by 33% using Multiprocessing in celery resulting in 19% faster video dubbing.• Used celery chunks for multi-segment video processing and updated the database models to store these segments.• Developed APIs for new features and integrated several services like Vimeo, Google Drive for better UX of product• Migrated the server to Asynchronous Server Gateway Interface to handle multi-processing pools.• Exposure: Python, Django, Django Rest Framework, Celery, PostgreSQL, AWS(EC2)
experience.description_html: • Optimised video processing service by 33% using Multiprocessing in celery resulting in 19% faster video dubbing.• Used celery chunks for multi-segment video processing and updated the database models to store these segments.• Developed APIs for new features and integrated several services like Vimeo, Google Drive for better UX of product• Migrated the server to Asynchronous Server Gateway Interface to handle multi-processing pools.• Exposure: Python, Django, Django Rest Framework, Celery, PostgreSQL, AWS(EC2)

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: • Developed backend for centralized version control system and created a CLI tool to interact with it.• Created an email microservice from scratch, integrated SSO, and deployed using E2 virtual machine on GCP.• Implemented topological sort algorithm to ensure dependency conditions are satisfied and acyclicity is maintained• Optimized the backend architecture (backend for frontend) using Gevent, making it 28% faster.• Exposure: Python, Django, Django Rest Framework, Python Click, PostgreSQL, GCP
experience.description_html: • Developed backend for centralized version control system and created a CLI tool to interact with it.• Created an email microservice from scratch, integrated SSO, and deployed using E2 virtual machine on GCP.• Implemented topological sort algorithm to ensure dependency conditions are satisfied and acyclicity is maintained• Optimized the backend architecture (backend for frontend) using Gevent, making it 28% faster.• Exposure: Python, Django, Django Rest Framework, Python Click, PostgreSQL, GCP
